message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.
Alice, your product is appealing, but I'm looking to pay closer to $850,000. This would be a fair price for both of us, allowing you a significant profit while still representing a great deal for me.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and am willing to consider a more reasonable offer. For your convenience, I propose a price of $900,000 for the product. This still represents a substantial profit for me while offering you a competitive price.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $900,000 is getting closer, I'm still hoping to reach a price closer to $875,000. This would represent a fair compromise for both of us.
Considering your position, Bob, I'm willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $890,000 for the product. This remains a profitable deal for me and offers you an attractive value.
